roleset.name: process or operation
roleset.note: PROCEDURE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to procedure in nombank and slight comparison to process.01-v. See FN class means. (from procedure.01-n)

example.name: both args
example.text: the exchange 's trading procedures , personnel , equipment and links with other exchanges

example.name: arg 1 in a
example.text: the procedures for the election of the president of the republic in March
example.arg: for the election of the president of the republic in March

example.name: with arg 2
example.text: the recruitment procedure for the Ministry of the Interior and the Ministry of Defense.
example.arg: for the Ministry of the Interior and the Ministry of Defense
